alert.note: Alert for Bedford; Blair (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 10 at 3:40AM EST until January 10 at 6:00PM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up 50 to 60 mph. * WHERE...Blair and Bedford Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive. For high wind safety information, visit weather.gov/safety/wind. The latest forecast information can be found on the NWS State College Facebook page and Twitter @NWSStateCollege, or on the web at weather.gov/ctp.
